alert.note: Alert for Christian (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 5:27PM CDT until May 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTY... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morrisonville, or 12 miles northwest of Nokomis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 5:10 PM, quarter size hail was reported east of Farmersville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morrisonville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
